data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Joe Lolley for Nottingham has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Anthony Knockaert (Nottingham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 68, Nathaniel Chalobah is booked for the away team.
At City Ground, Domingos Quina has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Vladan Ivic is making the team's first substitution at City Ground with Stipe Perica replacing Domingos Quina.
In the minute 84, Harry Arter (Nottingham) gets a yellow card.
The home team replace Joe Lolley with Sammy Ameobi.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Watford make their second substitution with Ben Wilmot replacing Craig Cathcart.
